description:
image/jpeg: handle fill bytes.

Fixes issue 4337.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

On Wed, Nov 7, 2012 at 5:44 PM, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
> perhaps adding a test?

http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=4337 has a test image,
but I'm not sure if it's worth checking in: the issue reporter says
that it was generated artificially, not by a real world program. I
also have a collection of test images, which now includes this one,
but I don't have the copyrights to share that set.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a53601cd4e63 ***

image/jpeg: handle fill bytes.

Fixes issue 4337.

R=r, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6814098

subject: code review 6814098: image/jpeg: handle fill bytes.
